page.title: 14Mortlach Church.
page.content: Mortlach Church is one of the oldest churches in Scotland.It used to be a small chapel,which was established by St Moluag of Lismore,Ireland around 566 A.D.The only relic remaining from that time is the Elephant Stone.The stone was uncovered whilst digging a grave in 1925.In the year 1010 the Battle of Mortlach took place in the grave_yard.King Malcolm II of Scotland extended the church by 3 spear lengths after being victorious against the Danes.There is also a Pictish stone called the Battle Stone which is a relic of that battle.The minister at the present time is Rev.H.Smith.
